title: Microsoft Names General Counsel Brad Smith President -Bloomberg
text:
Microsoft Corp. (MSFT) named general counsel Brad Smith president and chief legal officer, Bloomberg News reported Friday.
Chief Executive Satya Nadella wrote in an email to employees that Mr. Smith's work will include "strengthening our external relationships and representing the company publicly" and privacy and security initiatives, Bloomberg reported.
Full story at http://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2015-09-11/microsoft-appoints-brad-smith-as-president-chief-legal-officer
